message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.RO 

This paper discusses the challenges and approaches for lifelong learning in artificial learning systems, which is a topic that spans multiple sub-fields of computer science. However, given the focus on neural network models and their limitations, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses topics related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural networks (cs.NE), computer vision (cs.CV), and robotics (cs.RO), which are all relevant to the problem of lifelong learning in autonomous agents and robots.
